contexts.context: ...and hunger dominates the area. - The population <mark>flees</mark> as far as they can. Even the military...
...Hence, the robbers could steal 40 guilds and <mark>flee</mark>. The robbers were looked for but no trace...
...wandering around. - A big part of the <mark>fleeing</mark> ones, 700 individuals, fled to Casablanca....
